name: Decadent Baked Mac and Cheese
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This is a rendition of a macaroni and cheese dish a local restaurant makes. It's so rich and decadent I only make it once per year. It's not a “dieter's friend”. You can use any pasta shape you like.
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Meanwhile, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Stir in cream, half-and-half, and garlic salt
Add Gruyere cheese, 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, and Oaxaca cheese
Drain pasta and add to the sauce; stir to coat
Spray a casserole dish with cooking spray and pour in pasta mixture
Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is bubbly and slightly browned, 15 to 20 minutes
